author: bjh
msg: Improve the way aplibtool handles static library dependencies by listing a
libraries dependencies in the .la file and using that list when linking an
executable. Before this change, it was simply accumulating the object files
of any depended on libraries into the target library which is inefficient and
With this improvement, aplibtool can be used to build more complex projects

author: borisk
msg: Check that we have non-NULL host before trying to connect (XERCESC-1920).
